data.mergedPipelineYaml:
name: "testPipeline_Cypress"
identifier: "testPipeline_Cypress"
allowStageExecutions: false
projectIdentifier: "project1"
orgIdentifier: "default"
tags: {}
stages:
- stage:
    name: "testStage_Cypress"
    identifier: "testStage_Cypress"
    description: ""
    type: "Deployment"
    spec:
      serviceConfig:
        serviceRef: "<+input>"
        serviceDefinition:
          type: "Kubernetes"
          spec:
            variables: []
      infrastructure:
        environmentRef: "re"
        infrastructureDefinition:
          type: "KubernetesDirect"
          spec:
            connectorRef: "dynarace"
            namespace: "<+input>"
            releaseName: "release-<+INFRA_KEY>"
        allowSimultaneousDeployments: false
      execution:
        steps:
        - step:
            name: "Rollout Deployment"
            identifier: "rolloutDeployment"
            type: "K8sRollingDeploy"
            timeout: "10m"
            spec:
              skipDryRun: false
        - step:
            type: "K8sApply"
            name: "test"
            identifier: "test"
            spec:
              filePaths:
              - "test"
              skipDryRun: false
              skipSteadyStateCheck: false
            timeout: "10m"
        rollbackSteps:
        - step:
            name: "Rollback Rollout Deployment"
            identifier: "rollbackRolloutDeployment"
            type: "K8sRollingRollback"
            timeout: "10m"
            spec: {}
      serviceDependencies: []
    tags: {}
    failureStrategies:
    - onFailure:
        errors:
        - "AllErrors"
        action:
          type: "StageRollback"
